item.title: Seven Best Programming Languages To Learn
item.description: 1. Java Java is a general-purpose, object-oriented computer programming language developed by Sun Microsystems. Java was designed to make software portable across different platforms and devices. Java is often associated with the Internet and web applications due to its use in many web browsers and server programs. 2. C++ C++ (pronounced /ˈkɒpstʃ/), short for C with Classes, is a general purpose, imperative, class-based procedural programming language. It supports object orientation, modularity, exception handling, data abstraction, and dynamic memory allocation.
